DOC.criteria: Subject male age 18 45 Subject within 25 % ideal body weight weigh 55 95 kg Subject generally good health Subject nonsmoker Subject multiple severe allergy food medication Subject history metabolic bone disease , kidney/bladder stone , treatment bisphosphonates Subject infection , include HIV Subject donate blood take another investigational drug last month Subject consume excessive amount caffeine alcohol Subject history illness may confound result study pose additional risk administer study drug
